pullrequest.title: [Citadel] Fuel resource metadata, which can be used instead of 'model.config'

content.raw: Nitpick: some repeated fields are using plural (`annotations`, `dependencies`, `tags`), while others are using singular (`author`, `compatibility`). Looking through existing messages, it doesn't look like we follow a standard, but it would be nice to be consistent within the same message (and eventually across the entire library).
content.html: Nitpick: some repeated fields are using plural (annotations, dependencies, tags), while others are using singular (author, compatibility). Looking through existing messages, it doesn't look like we follow a standard, but it would be nice to be consistent within the same message (and eventually across the entire library).
